ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Are they trying to hasten Our punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do they want to hasten Our punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do they seek to hasten Our chastisement?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do they want to suffer Our torment immediately?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So are they being impatient for Our punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Do they seek to hasten on Our torment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: What! would they then hasten on Our chastisement?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What, do they seek to hasten Our chastisement?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Would they hasten on Our doom?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do they really wish to hasten Our punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Our torment seek they to hasten on!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do they seek to hasten Our punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Do they wish (indeed) to hurry on our Punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Do they seek to hasten on Our Torment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What, do they seek to hasten Our punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Are they seeking to hasten Our punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then for Our punishment are they impatient?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:176] They then said in mockery, ‘When will this chastisement be sent down?’ God, exalted be He, threatens them by saying: Do they seek to hasten Our chastisement?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Would they hasten on Our doom) is it something like Our punishment that they are hastening before its appointed time?
